==1. Package Summary==

The URDF, meshes, and other elements needed in the simulation are contained here. 

 * Autor: [http://www.robotnik.eu/ Robotnik Automation]
 * License: BSD
 * Source: svn http://robotnik-powerball-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/svn/robotnik-powerball-ros-pkg/trunk/robotnik_powerball_description
 
==2. Folders ==

===2.1. calibration===

Contains the calibration file used by the URDFs.

===2.2 meshes===

This folder has the meshes of the two Powerball available, the normal one and the Robotnik long modificated (only vary the 2 and 4 stl link).

===2.3 urdf===

This folder has four URDF of the two Powerball available, the normal one and the Robotnik long modificated. Also includes these same Powerball with the gripper attached. *Note that to launch correctly the two last URDF is necessary to have the [http://code.google.com/p/wsg50-ros-pkg/ WSG 50 ROS package].*
